website_summaries.verdict: With shimmering finishes like pink, gold, and silver, these brilliant and long-lasting birthday candles are sure to impress everyone at the party.
cons: Prices differ slightly between color options

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality candles
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. I bought them for a 2 reasons. I was looking for taller candles that weren't flimsy, and candles that did't melt fast and get wax all over the cake before they're blown out. These were perfect! I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Metallic coming off.
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute but mine had a few candles damaged. What I mean by damaged is the metallic was coming off some candles in the pack. Still looked great on the cake, just expect to receive a few candles damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Meliha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: When we first opened these candles we were worried they weren't real because the entire candle is dipped in the gold, including the wick, so they actually looked like pencils that needed to be sharpened. But as you light the candles the gold quickly melts away from just the wick. These were beautiful candles and great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The candles looked nice enough but when you remove the candles from the cake there is a good chance that the little plastic holder on the bottom stays in the cake and becomes a choking hazard for party guests. I had to put out major warnings to my party of 25 guests to be on the lookout for the pointy little holders. I did have 3 guests that found at least 1 or 2 holders in their piece of cake. Don't use with kids. OR take the holders off and just use the candle.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! Excellent quality! These def made my cake look even more amazing! Super easy to light
customer_reviews.author: Michele Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect candles !!
customer_reviews.text: Very good Candles . But there is only 6 in a pack I was under the impression there was 24 so I didn’t have enough for my sons birthday had to run out and buy a different kind ..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful color candles. Candles looked really elegant. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nat_Lup

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: Loved these candles! The color was fantastic, they looked expensive and so pretty. They come with a little base on them already that you can take off if u don’t want to use but I used them just as is they were perfect, looked amazing and burned for a good while. Even the box they came in looked fancy I loved these would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Bought four sweet 16 great price! Looked very elegant. Worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the cake
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice in the cake. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I’d buy these again and again... beautiful! We’ve been reusing them for birthdays and they’re gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Renee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put them on a cake yet, but they are just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Gotchoclate

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these candles. We used it for my 25th birthday. The wax doesn't melt fast, definitely long lasting!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great candles
customer_reviews.text: The candles lasted 4 songs for a birthday and were still going. They are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great candles for the price! They look very elegant and are easy to light. Overall satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: These candles looked so classy on my daughters sweet 16 cake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colored candles
customer_reviews.text: Got the gold champagne color for a cake I made for my best friends birthday and the metallic pink ones for my birthday. The colors were beautiful! The only thing you have to be careful about is the white plastic tip. When you take them out of the cake, some of them got lost in the frosting and they ending up in my mouth. So just be careful pulling them out and make sure you get any of the plastic that gets out before serving.
customer_reviews.author: MOD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed. Birthday girl loved them. They’re taller than the average birthday candles and the color was on point.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This came in 2 packs used 1 for my daughters birthday and they definitely added that extra something! Love the height of them. Packaged safely and have the other pack for another occasion stored away.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is so pretty , it’s shiny my daughter!s birthday party
customer_reviews.author: FINCH

customer_reviews.title: Grab these today!
customer_reviews.text: I used the candles on my sister's 30th birthday cake. They were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Another Purchase

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate...buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: Very classy and sophisticated for a cake. Great quality and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of small plastic stands - choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Only problem is that a few of the plastic candle stands got stuck in the cake / icing so be careful so nobody chokes.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Candles - Must have.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!!!!! It looked so elegant on a Chocolate Cake.
customer_reviews.author: BMG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Makes a big difference on a birthday cake, will always get these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: John Climacus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome candles
customer_reviews.text: Awesome candles. They are very slim and tall. Perfect for what I need. Not used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: efredrick69

customer_reviews.title: Dripless!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are dripless and add "life" to the party!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles
customer_reviews.text: These long thin candles were awesome on my husbands birthday cake. Love these candles. Quality outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frienda Metallic Birthday Cake Candles
customer_reviews.text: I'm very please with the candles. They were as advertised and delivered in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Very classic and easy to use for Moms 80th Birthday Cake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Frienda Metallic Birthday Cake Candles in Holders Long Thin Birthday Candles Cupcake Candles Wedding Party Cake Decorations (Pink)
feature_bullets: Quality material: those beautiful cake candles are made of non-toxic, safe paraffin
Variable size: 5.5 inch in length with 1.2 inch removable holder; You can use scissors to change the length of candle to what you need
Feature: long and thin metallic candles with holders for each candle, burned with a nice steady flame; They are very elegant and can burn for a long time

What you get: metallic long thin candles with holders; Good for mixing and matching to light up the party, adding the extra style and modern look; All packed neatly together and ready to hit the cake tops

Application: these beautiful metallic candles can be applied for any type of party or special occasion; Bring the bright warm gold glows to any birthday party or wedding; Also suitable for baby showers, gender reveal, bridal shower, and bachelorette parties, even Christmas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars229 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
